TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ProjectStartedEventArgs extends Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 事件的資料。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 警告： 標示 [Serializable] 型別，而實作 ISerializable 加諸的序列化合約，--它是一項承諾永遠不會變更的類型也就是欄位的型別不是不可變的;未遵循某些特殊的 FX 指導方針，將新欄位新增類型的下一個版本，可能會中斷向前及向後相容性WARNING: marking a type [Serializable] without implementing ISerializable imposes a serialization contract -- it is a promise to never change the type's fields i.e. the type is immutable; adding new fields in the next version of the type without following certain special FX guidelines, can break both forward and backward compatibility ## Examples 下列範例示範如何撰寫基本的記錄器，建置事件以回應。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]

summary.span: 取得事件的項目清單。

span.span: Gets the list of items for the event.
The list of items for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目和中繼資料透過存取最新狀態，且可以列舉整個專案的組建。The items and metadata accessed through are kept up-to-date and can be enumerated throughout the build of the project. 不過，變更這份清單中的項目時，不會影響建置程序。However, changing an item in this list will not affect the build process. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不適用於多處理器組建。This property does not work with multi-proc builds. 若要取得正確的結果，您可以關閉多處理器建置藉由指定`/m:1`（此為預設值）。To get proper results, you can turn off multi-proc building by specifying `/m:1` (which is the default).

summary.span: 取得事件的屬性清單。

span.span: Gets the list of properties for the event.
The list of properties for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性名稱和值透過存取最新狀態，且可以列舉整個專案的組建。The property names and values accessed through are kept up-to-date and can be enumerated throughout the build of the project. 不過，變更這份清單中的屬性時，不會影響建置程序。However, changing a property in this list will not affect the build process. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不適用於多處理器組建。This property does not work with multi-proc builds. 若要取得正確的結果，您可以多處理器建置指定的其中一個關閉`/m:1`（此為預設值），或可解決此限制，設定環境變數。To get proper results, you can either turn off multi-proc building by specifying `/m:1` (which is the default), or you can work around the limitation by setting an environment variable. 例如，設定`MSBuildForwardPropertiesFromChild=configuration;platform`轉送的 「 設定 」 和 「 平台 」 屬性，從子系節點。For example, setting `MSBuildForwardPropertiesFromChild=configuration;platform` forwards the "configuration" and "platform" properties from the child nodes. 除非已定義這個環境變數，不會轉送。Unless this environment variable is defined, nothing will be forwarded. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：在組建中使用環境變數](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f9e4469-8865-4b59-aab3-3ff26bd36e77)。For more information, see [How to: Use Environment Variables in a Build](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f9e4469-8865-4b59-aab3-3ff26bd36e77).
